title: Ping Rises when others watch youtube/netflix?
body: So when my siblings watch netflix or youtube, or download an app or something, my ping rises like crazy. is there a way or a program I can use to prioritize my bandwidth to league?

replies.body:
*WaltenWalt* is correct, if you have administrative access, you can hop into your modem or router's settings and use a feature called QoS (Quality of Service) if your router/modem has it. This feature can allow you to set bandwidth per client (device) and/or set bandwidth per site/service.

Other than that, you can try to play during times when others aren't using the network so heavily or try upgrading your Internet plan to accommodate all the bandwidth being used. Let me know if you have any questions.

The only way I can think of is in the router settings. If you are able to access the admin settings to your router you can set specific programs for the router to prioritize in terms of the bandwidth stream. 

At least that is the case with my Linksys router.
